<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15619</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Konturen der Europäischen Länder</string>
            <string language="en">Shapes of European Countries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forme des pays européens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dá forma de países europeus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modella dei paesi europei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μορφές των ευρωπαϊκών χωρών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Forma de países europeos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Ein interaktives Programm zum Erlernen und Erkennen der Konturen der europäischen Länder. Die Flagge muss jeweils dem richtigen Land zugeordnet werden.</string>
            <string language="en">An interactive program for learning and recognizing the shapes of European Countries. You will have to choose the flag of the appropriate country according to the shown country shape.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un programme interactif pour apprendre et 
identifier les formes des pays européens. Vous devrez choisir 
l'indicateur du pays approprié selon la forme montrée de pays.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um programa interativo para aprender e reconhecer
as formas de países europeus. Você terá que escolher a 
bandeira do país apropriado de acordo com a forma mostrada do país.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma interattivo per imparare e 
riconoscere le figure dei paesi europei. Dovrete scegliere la 
bandierina del paese adatto secondo la figura indicata del paese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα διαλογικό πρόγραμμα για και τις μορφές των 
ευρωπαϊκών χωρών. Θα πρέπει να επιλέξετε τη σημαία της 
κατάλληλης χώρας σύμφωνα με την εμφανισμένη μορφή χωρών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un programa interactivo para aprender y reconocer
las dimensiones de una variable de países europeos. Usted 
tendrá que elegir el indicador del país apropiado según la 
dimensión de una variable mostrada del país.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="de">SchülerInnen können hier ihr Wissen über die Umrisse und Konturen europäischer Länder beweisen. Sie müssen die Flagge dem richtigen Land zuordnen.</string>
            <string language="en">Pupils will demonstrate their knowledge of the shapes of European countries. They will have to drag the flags to the proper place according to the shown country shape.</string>
          </description>
